item.title: Center Home in Salmon Bay #1
item.description: A cosy home located in the center of Salmon Bay right next to the entrance of the market and very close to the town’s well.

item.title: Center Home in Salmon Bay #2
item.description: A cosy home located in the center of Salmon Bay right next to the path leading to the town’s school and very close to the town’s well.

item.title: Center Home in Salmon Bay #3
item.description: A cosy home located in the center of Salmon Bay right next to the path leading to the town’s school and very close to the town’s well.

item.title: Center Home in Salmon Bay #4
item.description: A cosy home located in the center of Salmon Bay right next to the entrance of the market and very close to the town’s well.

item.title: Center Home in Salmon Bay #5
item.description: A cosy home located in the center of Salmon Bay right next to the entrance of the market and very close to the town’s pond.

item.title: Economy
item.description: Currency The in-game currency will be hosted on a blockchain based on Polygon to allow fast and inexpensive transfers.

item.title: Farm in Salmon Bay #1
item.description: A very key location in Salmon Bay. This farm provides consumables to the town’s residents, it goes without saying that this beautiful farm receives extra rewards from the town for the services provided to the residents!

item.title: Garden Home in Salmon Bay #1
item.description: One of the few homes in Salmon Bay’s garden, located just in front of the ocean, the gardens provide the best view point in all of Salmon Bay.

item.title: Garden Home in Salmon Bay #2
item.description: One of the few homes in Salmon Bay’s garden, located just in front of the ocean, the gardens provide the best view point in all of Salmon Bay.

item.title: Garden Home in Salmon Bay #3
item.description: One of the few homes in Salmon Bay’s garden, located just in front of the ocean, the gardens provide the best view point in all of Salmon Bay.

item.title: Hidden Home in Salmon Bay
item.description: A beautiful and unique home, hidden behind Salmon Bay’s market and its renowned waterfall. Its unique location and private path leading to the entrance makes it a very cozy location for players who wish to be left alone while being right next to the pond and markets.

item.title: Plaza Home in Salmon Bay #1
item.description: You and your pals are looking for a place to settle down together? You’ve just found the perfect place.

item.title: Pond Home in Salmon Bay #1
item.description: This house is located in a really nice area. The beautiful pond adds to the peaceful atmosphere of the place.

item.title: Pond Home in Salmon Bay #2
item.description: This house is located in a really nice area. The beautiful pond adds to the peaceful atmosphere of the place.

item.title: Shore Home in Salmon Bay
item.description: A beautiful and unique home, located on the shore of Salmon Bay, next to the fish market and port.

item.title: Training Home in Salmon Bay #1
item.description: A beautiful and unique home, located on the shore of Salmon Bay, next to the fish market and port.

item.title: Training Home in Salmon Bay #2
item.description: This great house is located in one of the most busy part of the town: the training grounds.

item.title: Website Launch
item.description: Website is live! Our website is now live, while it may not contain much at the moment, we hope to share new information with you as often as possible!
